title: Reflected Swf XSS In ( plugins.svn.wordpress.org )
vulnerability_information:
Hello ,
 I have found XSS in flash File ( video-js.swf ) in  plugins.svn.wordpress.org 
 and Content Spoofing Vulnerability in moxieplayer.swf

          ** POC **
https://plugins.svn.wordpress.org/1player/tags/1.3/players/video-js/video-js.swf?readyFunction=alert(%27Hello%27)


{F222664}


https://plugins.svn.wordpress.org/agile-video-player/trunk/js/plugins/media/moxieplayer.swf?url=hekimuso1973.xsl.pt/723.flv

activities.message:
Thanks for the report, @m7mdharoun. As you'll have realised, this is a directory listing of the public Subversion repo for the WordPress Plugin Directory.

You should contact [the Plugins Team](https://developer.wordpress.org/plugins/wordpress-org/plugin-developer-faq/#how-can-i-send-a-security-report) and report the issue to them. They'll be able to pass on your report to the plugin author.

Happy bug hunting!
John
shall we ?

This report is not valid for this program, but the plugin author still needs to be made aware of the issue in order to fix it if the issue remains in the latest version of the plugin.

This report won't be disclosed. Thanks.

Hello @johnbillion ,
 Thanks for Fast Reply :) my point here is all swf files on this sudomain  _not work or loading_ _only download through my browser_ but ( moxieplayer.swf and Video-js.swf ) they are work and make the xss
           ** Fix  **
 it must be not work like other Swf files only Download :)

another notice :D this is the fixed swf in /1.4/ path 
https://plugins.svn.wordpress.org/1player/tags/1.4/players/video-js/video-js.swf

I think my report is Valid and there is bug in the subdomain Cause this 2 files must not loading only Download like this swf file : https://plugins.svn.wordpress.org/advanced-dewplayer/trunk/dewplayer.swf
@iandunn @xknown @voldemortensen @nikolayb Please :) can you see this and Know what I mean ?
Hi, thanks for the follow-up. We'll discuss it as a team and let you know what we think. It might take us a bit of time, though. I appreciate your patience :)

Hello @iandunn , 
  Thanks for Very fast reply As I mentioned all swf files not work on this subdomain but ( moxieplayer.swf and Video-js.swf ) are loading normally and exute the XSS.
Hello @iandunn is there any update ?

Thanks @vortfu for reopening this report :) as I mentioned this 2 swf files are loading and work normally but all other swf files in other paths not loading or working only ( downlaod directly throw browsers )

Hello @vortfu ,
       This report seems #fixed. now the 2 swf files download Not Loading.

Thanks MÃ¸hamed, we haven't finished doing everything on our end yet, but we'll let you know once we're ready to resolve this. We have a large backlog to work though, though, so we're not always able to respond quickly.
Thanks, we're still working on a fix, but will let you know when we have something to report.

Hi @iandunn ,
 This Report is more than 2 months and No Update in his Status :) When will be Triaged ?

We're a small team of volunteers, so it's not always possible for us to get to everything as quickly as we'd like. We get so many reports (mostly invalid or low-severity) that even sorting through them to find the ones that are actually worth spending time on is a full-time job. 

We're working on ways to improve the situation, but right now we're a bit overwhelmed.

This is in our queue and we'll get to it when we're able, but unfortunately I can't tell you when that will be. I appreciate your patience.

@iandunn Can I suggest fix : 

>Only Copy the fixed swf file and change the vulnerable swf by the fixed swf

Hi @iandunn ,
 is there any update :) even triage ?
Hey, I'm sorry there hasn't been any movement here yet. We still have a lot of higher priority issues that we need to focus on our time on.
Hi @iandunn is there any Update?

I'm sorry, not yet. We've managed to clear out a good chunk of our backlog, but we still have higher priority issues that we're focused on right now. Right now I don't have an estimate on when we'll get to this one.

Hi @iandunn seems the bug now fixed Now when I try to load the 2 swf files on the browser it ask to download like other swf files .
{F303463}
Hi @wordpress The bug has been fixed .. The 2 swf files not load any more

Hi @iandunn @wordpress @voldemortensen ,
This report is Resolved Now Why there is no Update ?
Hello @wordpress update here ?!

Hey @m7mdharoun,

Sorry about the lack of response here. There was an internal comment here June 10th that I thought was visible to everyone. It stated that this was fixed through another report. It was identified and fixed through that other report because it more clearly defined the issue and had a thorough textual PoC with full steps for recreating the actual issue (for reference, you needed to `svn propset svn:mime-type` to force a mimetype that would be run instead of downloaded).

Let me look into publicly disclosing that one and figure out what exactly should be done with this one.

Thanks,
Aaron
Thanks @aaroncampbell for fast response and the bounty :)
Hi can I request Public disclose? But Hide all Comments I want only the Summary
